ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: Site
Notes: Study Site

ElementDescription: Time Point
Notes: 888 = not applicable; 999 = missing

ElementDescription: When I'm walking, I deliberately notice the sensations of my body moving.
Notes: 1=never or very rarely true; 2= rarely true; 3= sometimes true; 4= often true; 5= very often or always true; 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire Subscale Observing
Notes: For 39-item ffmq, items 1, 6, 11, 15, 20, 26, 31, 36 are summed. For the the 24-item ffmq, items 6, 10, 15, and 20 are summed; 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire Subscale Describing
Notes: For 39-item ffmq, items 2, 7, 12R, 16R, 22R, 27, 32, 37 are summed. For the the 24-item ffmq, items 1, 2, 5R, 11R, and 16 are summed; 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire Subscale Acting with awareness
Notes: For 39-item ffmq, items 5R, 8R, 13R, 18R, 23R, 28R, 34R, 38R are summed. For the the 24-item ffmq, items 8R, 12R, 17R, 22R, and 23R are summed; 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire Subscale Nonjudging of inner experience
Notes: For 39-item ffmq, items 3R, 10R, 14R, 17R, 25R, 30R, 35R, 39R are summed. For the the 24-item ffmq, items 4R, 7R, 14R, 19R, and 24R are summed; 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Five Facet Mindfulness Questionnaire Subscale Nonreactivity to inner experience
Notes: For 39-item ffmq, items 4, 9, 19, 21, 24, 29, 33 are summed. For the the 24-item ffmq, items 3, 9, 13, 18, 21 are summed; 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: FFMQ total score
Notes: 999= Missing Data

ElementDescription: Form used/assessment name
Visit name
FFMQ: Experience Emo w/out Reacting (2 wks)
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Rarely; 2=Sometimes; 3=Often; 4=Very Often;-8=DON''T KNOW; -7=REFUSED; -5=Presented, not answered

ElementDescription: FFMQ: Pay Attention Sensations (2 wks)
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Rarely; 2=Sometimes; 3=Often; 4=Very Often;-8=DON''T KNOW; -7=REFUSED; -5=Presented, not answered

ElementDescription: FFMQ: Distress Thoughts w/out React (2 wks)
Notes: 0=Never; 1=Rarely; 2=Sometimes; 3=Often; 4=Very Often; -8=DON''T KNOW; -7=REFUSED; -5=Presented, not answered

ElementDescription: FFMQ (five facet mindfulness) Non-React Raw Score
Notes: Higher scores indicate more mindfulness.
